评论详情: I love these.  They're large enough to be noticeable but small enough to be feminine.  Very nice design and very happy with them.
I was worried these would be a little big but they are actually on the smaller side. PERFECT size!
These earrings are adorable and well made! They aren’t as big as I expected but that’s alright! I didn’t want them to be huge. I have shoulder length hair and I can see them. Perfect for me!
I really like these earrings, and I didn’t realize this until I got them but the back of the earring is connected by a chain and idk, I find that awesome bc it helps not losing the backs uk?
Broke within a week
These are pretty, lightweight/comfortable, and match just about anything!

评论概述: Super cute earrings, chains are very dainty though.
评论详情: These are super cute earrings and get lots of complements whenever I wear them. The chains are very dainty though and have to be very careful with them. I have to be careful where I'm going and what i'm going as they tangle easy and catch on things. They don't travel well either (in your luggage / travel jewelry cases). I find I have to have my hair tied up or back so my hair is not getting tangled in them or it can be a thing. It's weird.... so they don't get as much wear I'd figure they would.  The don't bother my skin though... for those who need hypoallergenic metal. No goofy color changes with these... so truly a good stainless steel.
I bought these in gun metal and got so many compliments. So cool.
Gothic, cheap
I bought this set because it was to be two different hues of silver. One pair is black.
The earrings arrived broken and because they were a christmas gift, this was not discovered until Christmas day, long past the return window. Poor quality and poor packaging.
Opens and chain feel off
Came fairly quickly and in one piece. Smaller than I thought but that's OK cause I don't like gawdy jewelry.

It's kind of cheap-ish - I've been wearing them every day and some of the metal looks a little discolored after a couple of weeks. HOWEVER, I think they're 1) a great price, 2) versatile in that you can select the colors you want in a pack, 3) stylish, and 4) convenient - what a great idea to have the back of the earring connected to the earring itself, so you don't lose anything!
One of the earrings arrived broken and I can’t fix it :(
My daughter loves these earrings.
They were broken when they arrived.
Absolutely love them super cute!

These earrings are pretty and comfortable. They can be worn all day long without pinching the ears.  They do tangle a little bit, but I've never had a pair of drop dangle earrings that didn't tangle sometimes, so I didn't take off any stars for that.  Overall, I really like them and would not hesitate to purchase another pair if I ever lost these.

评论概述: Spunky and Punky/ Nice with Spice
评论详情: I love the design of these earrings because they have a simultaneously sophisticated and rebellious look going on.  They are perfect to wear at work and to Goth night at the club.  I'd buy them in every color if I could.

I could not rave more about these earrings! They are absolutely gorgeous and add a bit of an edge to any outfit.  And they're so unique!  These are my go- to earrings for just about any outfit.  I am extremely sensitive to the metal in most earrings and I haven't had a single issue with these lovely ones.  Absolutely recommend.
Beautiful and perfect length. Can be dressed elegant or goth, love these!

评论概述: Great aesthetic, not the best quality
评论详情: I'm not sure what was on these earrings when I received them, but when I wore them (without cleaning them, since they're new) I had consistently had an allergic reaction to them. I thought at first maybe it was the coating/metal. After giving them a really good alcohol rinse I have had no reaction.  Despite that I REALLY love the design of these! They're not just cool, but they're practical in that you can't lose the earing backing without losing the whole earing (which is way harder than just losing a backing).  The earing itself and the backing are a snug fit. They are metal with a thin black coating on them. When sliding the backing on it feels like its catching on the coating, maybe scrapping it up. So I don't have confidence they could last for very long, but at least until then, they look cool.

Who doesn't like a pair of chain earring? It gives me punk rock vibes from growing up. I really like them; they are cute and very stylish as well. Very comfortable to wear, not heavy at all. They go with any outfit and look good either with your daily wear or evening wear. I like the look of chain threader earrings but sometimes I don't actually like the feeling of the chain going through my pierced hole as it tends to be too big, these look like that but have the typical earring post that doesn't feel like the chain ones do. I like them a lot!!

They so cool and stylish, they work with every outfit I’ve worn so far. I feel like they give me an edgy look. The backs can be a little difficult to put on, so that takes some practice. At least you’ll never lose them since it’s attached to the earring. It’s also light weight which I appreciate, you can wear in comfort for hours.

评论概述: Cute, a little smaller than I thought
评论详情: Got these for a steampunk themed event! They come in a cute jewelry box, with each earring individually packaged in a small plastic bag to prevent them from tangling up. Very gift-able for sure. My ears tend to be sensitive to some materials, but these I can wear without issue and can wear them outside of the event I got them for. I'd expected them to be a bit bigger (they're about half the size I expected), however they're very cute on.
A bit long but very sturdy. The color is a bit darker than I'd like, but they are cool nonetheless.

These are great earrings. The style is really fun and the chain is just what I was looking for.  The gold shade is very real looking and the metal has not caused any irritation in my ears which are pretty sensitive to different metals.  Great value!
